verses.roman:
mahā-ucca-saṅkīrtane ākāśa bharila
prabhura uddaṇḍa-nṛtye bhūmi-kampa haila

synonyms: mahā-ucca-saṅkīrtane—by a great and loud performance of chanting; ākāśa—the sky; bharila—became filled; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; uddaṇḍa-nṛtye—by dancing and jumping high; bhūmi-kampa—earthquake; haila—there was.
translation: The sky was filled with the great and loud chanting of saṅkīrtana, and the earth shook from the jumping and dancing of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
